scripts.dev: set BROWSER=none && set PORT=3000 && env-cmd -f .env react-scripts start
scripts.build:dev: env-cmd -f .env.development react-scripts build && npm run sitemap:dev
scripts.build:qa: env-cmd -f .env.qa react-scripts build && npm run sitemap:qa
scripts.build:staging: env-cmd -f .env.staging react-scripts build && npm run sitemap:staging

dependencies.@headlessui/react: UI components for React, designed to integrate beautifully with Tailwind CSS
dependencies.@tippyjs/react: complete tooltip, popover, dropdown, and menu solution for the web, powered by Popper
dependencies.axios: promise based HTTP client for the browser and node.js
dependencies.chart.js: simple HTML5 charts using the canvas element
dependencies.dayjs: date library for parsing, validating, manipulating, and formatting dates
dependencies.env-cmd: executes a command using the environment variables in an env file
dependencies.marked: a low-level, lightweight markdown compiler for parsing markdown
dependencies.react-datepicker: react component for choosing date and date range
dependencies.react-dom: react package for working with the dom
dependencies.react-drag-listview: drag list view and table view component for react
dependencies.react-router-dom: bindings for using React Router in web applications
dependencies.react-scripts: scripts and configuration used by Create React App
dependencies.react-spinners: collection of loading spinners with React.js
dependencies.react-textarea-autosize: textarea component for react which grows with content

devDependencies.@tailwindcss/forms: resets basic form styles making form elements easy to override with utilities
devDependencies.@tailwindcss/typography: plugin that provides a set of prose classes you can use to add beautiful typographic defaults to any vanilla HTML you don't control, like HTML rendered from Markdown, or pulled from a CMS
devDependencies.@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin: eslint plugin which provides lint rules for TypeScript codebases.
devDependencies.@typescript-eslint/parser: eslint parser which leverages TypeScript ESTree to allow for eslint to lint TypeScript source code
devDependencies.autoprefixer: PostCSS plugin to parse CSS and add vendor prefixes to CSS rules using values from Can I Use, recommended by Google and used in Twitter and Alibaba
devDependencies.eslint-config-prettier: turns off all rules that are unnecessary or might conflict with Prettier
devDependencies.eslint-plugin-react: react specific linting rules for eslint
devDependencies.husky: provides git hooks: helps improving and defining commit
devDependencies.lint-staged: run linters against staged git files
devDependencies.postcss: parse CSS and add vendor prefixes to CSS rules using values from Can I Use
devDependencies.serve: static file serving and directory listing
devDependencies.tailwindcss: utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom user interfaces.
